verses.text: “If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* steals \w an|strong="H5221"\w* ox \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sheep \w and|strong="H1818"\w* slaughters \w or|strong="H4191"\w* sells \w it|strong="H5221"\w*, \w he|strong="H5221"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* repay five oxen \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* ox \w and|strong="H1818"\w* four sheep \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sheep.

If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thief \w is|strong="H8121"\w* caught breaking \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w is|strong="H8121"\w* beaten \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H1818"\w*, no one \w shall|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H8121"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7999"\w* if \w it|strong="H5704"\w* happens \w after|strong="H5704"\w* sunrise, \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* guilt \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* bloodshed. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* thief must \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w full|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*; if \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w has|strong="H3027"\w* nothing, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* sold \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w theft|strong="H1591"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H7999"\w* \w was|strong="H7704"\w* stolen \w is|strong="H7704"\w* actually found alive \w in|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* possession—whether ox \w or|strong="H7704"\w* donkey \w or|strong="H7704"\w* sheep—\w he|strong="H3588"\w* must \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w back|strong="H7999"\w* double.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w grazes|strong="H1197"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* livestock \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w or|strong="H7704"\w* vineyard \w and|strong="H7704"\w* allows \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* stray \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* graze \w in|strong="H4672"\w* someone \w else|strong="H3588"\w*’s \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* must \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* best \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* own \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w or|strong="H7704"\w* vineyard.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire breaks \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w spreads|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* thornbushes \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* consumes stacked \w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w standing|strong="H7453"\w* grain, \w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* whole field, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H8104"\w* started \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fire must \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w full|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* gives \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* money \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w goods|strong="H4399"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* safekeeping \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* stolen \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w thief|strong="H1590"\w*, if \w caught|strong="H4672"\w*, \w must|strong="H3808"\w* pay \w back|strong="H1004"\w* double.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* thief \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* found, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* owner \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house must appear \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* judges \w to|strong="H5704"\w* determine whether \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* taken \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*’s \w property|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w In|strong="H4191"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* cases \w of|strong="H3605"\w* illegal possession \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment, \w or|strong="H7794"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* lost item \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w someone|strong="H5414"\w* claims, ‘\w This|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w mine|strong="H8104"\w*,’ \w both|strong="H3605"\w* parties \w shall|strong="H7794"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* cases \w before|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* judges. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* judges \w find|strong="H7200"\w* guilty \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* back double \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* gives \w a|strong="H3068"\w* donkey, \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ox, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sheep, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w other|strong="H7453"\w* \w animal|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* cared \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* dies \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* injured \w or|strong="H3808"\w* stolen \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* watching,

\w an|strong="H1589"\w* oath \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H1167"\w* be \w made|strong="H7999"\w* \w between|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* parties \w to|strong="H5973"\w* determine whether \w or|strong="H1589"\w* not \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* \w has|strong="H1167"\w* taken \w his|strong="H5973"\w* neighbor’s property. \w The|strong="H5973"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* must accept \w the|strong="H5973"\w* oath \w and|strong="H5973"\w* require no \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* if \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w animal|strong="H2966"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* actually stolen \w from|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* neighbor, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* owner.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* animal \w was|strong="H7592"\w* \w torn|strong="H7665"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H7453"\w* \w bring|strong="H4191"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* evidence; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* need \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w torn|strong="H7665"\w* carcass.

\w If|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H7916"\w* borrows \w an|strong="H7999"\w* animal \w from|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* neighbor \w and|strong="H5973"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* injured \w or|strong="H3808"\w* dies \w while|strong="H1931"\w* \w its|strong="H1167"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w present|strong="H7999"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w full|strong="H7999"\w* \w restitution|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* owner \w was|strong="H3808"\w* present, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* restitution \w is|strong="H3808"\w* required. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* animal \w was|strong="H3808"\w* rented, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fee covers \w the|strong="H3588"\w* loss.

If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man seduces \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* who \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w pledged|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* marriage \w and|strong="H3701"\w* sleeps \w with|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* must \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* full \w dowry|strong="H4119"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife.

If her father absolutely refuses \w to|strong="H2421"\w* \w give|strong="H2421"\w* her \w to|strong="H2421"\w* \w him|strong="H2421"\w*, \w the|strong="H3808"\w* man still \w must|strong="H3808"\w* pay \w an|strong="H2421"\w* amount comparable \w to|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* bridal price \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* virgin.
\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H4191"\w* allow \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sorceress \w to|strong="H4191"\w* live.
Whoever lies \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* animal must surely \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* death.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3588"\w* sacrifices \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w god|strong="H3808"\w* other \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* alone, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* set apart \w for|strong="H3588"\w* destruction.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* exploit \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w oppress|strong="H6031"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreign resident, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3605"\w* foreigners \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt.
\w You|strong="H3588"\w* must \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w mistreat|strong="H6031"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* widow \w or|strong="H8085"\w* orphan.

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w* do mistreat \w them|strong="H2026"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H2719"\w* cry out \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Me|strong="H2026"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* distress, \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w surely|strong="H1961"\w* hear \w their|strong="H1961"\w* cry.

\w My|strong="H7760"\w* anger \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* kindled, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* kill \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sword; \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wives \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w widows|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* children \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* fatherless.

If \w you|strong="H5704"\w* lend money \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H7453"\w* \w of|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H7725"\w* people among \w you|strong="H5704"\w* who \w is|strong="H8121"\w* poor, \w you|strong="H5704"\w* must \w not|strong="H7725"\w* act \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* creditor \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*; \w you|strong="H5704"\w* are \w not|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* charge \w him|strong="H7725"\w* interest.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* neighbor’s \w cloak|strong="H8071"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* collateral, return \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* sunset,

because \w his|strong="H7043"\w* cloak \w is|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* only covering \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H5971"\w* \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H7043"\w* body. What \w else|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* sleep \w in|strong="H5971"\w*? \w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w if|strong="H7043"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* cries \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w Me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* hear, \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am compassionate.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* blaspheme \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* curse \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ruler \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* must \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w hold|strong="H6213"\w* back offerings \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* granaries \w or|strong="H3117"\w* vats. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* firstborn \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* sons.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H7704"\w* do likewise \w with|strong="H1320"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* cattle \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* sheep. \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H7993"\w* stay \w with|strong="H1320"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* mothers \w for|strong="H7704"\w* seven days, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* eighth \w day|strong="H6944"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H7704"\w* \w them|strong="H7993"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Me|strong="H7993"\w*.
You are to be My holy people. You must not eat the meat of \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mauled animal found in the field; you are to throw it to the dogs.
